name: Hoard It! (RichardULZ)
description:
Hoard It! By GamesOrWhatever
Based on the famicase by Nick Holland @nickhtw

A top down dungeon crawler where you collect as much stuff as you can!

z and x for sword and dash, hold z+x+up to cycle swords.

Sword and item models by Trevor @3_Foot_Giraffe
Programming, Music & other models by Richard @richardulz

For A Game By Its Cover 2017 https://itch.io/jam/a-game-by-its-cover-2017/rate/178570
v1.0 Initial release, Winnitron-compatible?
v1.1 100% more spikes, 3 new map layouts picked at random, Slimes can hoard keys!
